```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(projoint)
```


```{r}
outcomes <- str_c("choice", seq(from = 1, to = 8, by = 1))
outcomes <- c(outcomes, "choice1_repeated_flipped")
out1 <- reshape_conjoint(.data = exampleData1, 
                         .idvar = "ResponseId", 
                         .outcomes = outcomes,
                         .outcomes_ids = c("A", "B"),
                         .alphabet = "K", 
                         .repeated = TRUE,
                         .flipped = TRUE)
```


```{r}
d <- out1$data
```
